events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as you have relevant software development experience mentioned in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will guide you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well, discussing your previous software engineering projects and familiarity with development tools.
You responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next steps in the interview process including the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th, where you will be assessed on coding skills and software architecture principles.
The technical interview was completed successfully. You demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in software development.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit with company culture and to answer any of your questions about the role.
The HR interview went well, with positive feedback on your communication skills and alignment with the team's values.
An official offer has been proposed for the software engineer position, including details about compensation and onboarding plans.
You have accepted the job offer and confirmed your start date with the HR team, commencing your journey as part of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started smoothly with access to required development tools and introduction sessions with the engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially completed. We are excited to have you onboard as a software engineer contributing to our projects.
